name: Trash Game (mokarrom)
description:
a game made using Pygame

Use Arrow key to move the Fish and avoid hitting the trash

Survive as long as you can

CAN YOU GO BEYOND 60 sec?

Yeah I know it looks like s#!t but I just made it for a personal challenge

+made in 3 days 🙂

If you are wondering what all the fuzz is about : https://teamseas.org/
